title: 84/134/EEC: Commission Decision of 2 March 1984 amending the list of third countries from which Member States authorize imports of bovine animals, swine and fresh meat
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 2 March 1984
amending the list of third countries from which Member States authorize imports of bovine animals, swine and fresh meat
(84/134/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 79/542/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
